snippet.title: Arena Circus Trailer
snippet.description:
A promotional video for the visual novel Arena Circus. 

https://harlevin.itch.io/arenacircus

A dramatic adventure set in a fantasy world where appearance is everything and humans are at the bottom of the totem pole. Aldrich and Lilié are trying to battle their way to the top of a world that looks down on them—and soon it will become far more than just a matter of pride.

3/6 chapters of Lilie's route (Cannot play as Aldrich yet) 

Warnings for: language, violence, some gore, disturbing themes, sexual themes

Gameplay time: 4 + hours 

90,000 + words 

20 +CGs 

38+ clothing items

Re-uploaded from an old account
